channel.title: How do i edit npc experience?
channel.description: I have Testscape, just for the record. Alright, how do I change the amount of XP recieved from each hit when you hit an NPC? Can I please have a code that I can use CTRL+F on?[br][size=1]Posted on: October 01, 2007, 09:03:42 PM[/size][hr]Anybody? Please help...[br][size=1]Posted on: October 01, 2007, 09:07:54 PM[/size][hr]Help me!! (I apologize in advance for spamming, if I am spamming)[br][size=1]Posted on: October 01, 2007, 09:11:17 PM[/size][hr]For the love of God, please help!!!!! I'm sooo confused!
